net.ulrice.databinding.validation
Interface IFValidator<T>

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractValidator, RegExValidator, StringLengthValidator
public interface IFValidator<T>

Interface for an attribute validator.

Author:
christof

          Clear the validation errors.
